steps.title: Soak Rice
steps.description: Wash and soak 2 cups of basmati rice in water for 30 minutes. This helps the rice cook evenly and become fluffy.

steps.title: Marinate Chicken
steps.description: Mix 500g chicken pieces with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, turmeric, and salt. Let it marinate for 15 minutes.

steps.title: Fry Onions
steps.description: Heat oil and fry sliced onions until golden brown. Remove half and set aside for garnish. Keep the rest in the pan.

steps.title: Cook Chicken
steps.description: Add marinated chicken to the fried onions. Cook on medium heat until chicken is 80% done, stirring occasionally.

steps.title: Layer Rice
steps.description: Boil the soaked rice until 70% cooked. Layer the rice over the chicken. Sprinkle fried onions, mint, and saffron milk on top.

steps.title: Dum Cooking
steps.description: Cover the pot tightly with foil and lid. Cook on low heat for 20 minutes. Let it rest for 5 minutes before serving.

steps.title: Prepare Paneer
steps.description: Cut 250g paneer into cubes. Soak in warm water with a pinch of salt to keep them soft.

steps.title: Make Tomato Puree
steps.description: Blanch 4 tomatoes in hot water, peel and blend into smooth puree. Add 2 cashews for creaminess.

steps.title: Prepare Base
steps.description: Heat butter in a pan. Add cumin seeds, bay leaf, and chopped onions. Sauté until golden brown.

steps.title: Add Spices
steps.description: Add ginger-garlic paste, tomato puree, red chili powder, coriander powder, and garam masala. Cook until oil separates.

steps.title: Add Paneer
steps.description: Add paneer cubes, cream, and a little water. Simmer for 5 minutes. Add kasuri methi and butter on top.

steps.title: Garnish & Serve
steps.description: Garnish with fresh cream and coriander leaves. Your paneer butter masala is ready to serve!

steps.title: Prepare Dough
steps.description: Mix 2 cups flour, 1 tsp yeast, 1 tsp sugar, salt, and warm water. Knead into a smooth dough. Let it rest covered for 30 minutes.

steps.title: Make Pizza Sauce
steps.description: Heat olive oil, add crushed garlic, tomato puree, oregano, basil, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes.

steps.title: Roll Dough
steps.description: Punch down the dough and roll it into a 10-inch circle. Place on a greased baking tray or pizza pan.

steps.title: Add Toppings
steps.description: Spread pizza sauce evenly. Add mozzarella cheese, fresh basil leaves, and drizzle olive oil on top.

steps.title: Bake Pizza
steps.description: Preheat oven to 220°C. Bake the pizza for 12-15 minutes until cheese is melted and crust is golden brown.

steps.title: Serve Hot
steps.description: Remove from oven, slice into pieces, and serve hot with red chili flakes and oregano on the side.

steps.title: Prepare Garlic Butter
steps.description: Mix softened butter with minced garlic, chopped parsley, salt, and a pinch of oregano in a bowl.

steps.title: Slice Bread
steps.description: Take a French baguette or bread loaf. Cut diagonal slices about 1-inch thick, but don't cut all the way through.

steps.title: Apply Butter
steps.description: Generously spread the garlic butter mixture between each slice and on top of the bread.

steps.title: Add Cheese (Optional)
steps.description: Sprinkle mozzarella or parmesan cheese on top for extra flavor and richness.

steps.title: Bake
steps.description: Wrap in foil and bake at 180°C for 10 minutes. Remove foil and bake for 3 more minutes for crispy top.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Remove from oven, cut through completely, and serve hot with pasta or soup.

steps.title: Marinate Mutton
steps.description: Marinate 500g mutton pieces with yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, and salt for 30 minutes.

steps.title: Fry Onions
steps.description: Heat ghee in a pressure cooker. Add sliced onions and fry until golden brown.

steps.title: Add Spices
steps.description: Add Kashmiri red chili powder, fennel powder, ginger powder, and marinated mutton. Mix well.

steps.title: Pressure Cook
steps.description: Add water and pressure cook for 6-7 whistles or until mutton is tender and cooked through.

steps.title: Make Gravy
steps.description: Open cooker, add garam masala and kasuri methi. Cook on low heat until gravy thickens to desired consistency.

steps.title: Garnish
steps.description: Garnish with fresh coriander leaves. Serve hot with naan or steamed rice.

steps.title: Boil Noodles
steps.description: Boil 200g noodles in salted water until just cooked. Drain and rinse with cold water. Toss with 1 tsp oil.

steps.title: Prepare Vegetables
steps.description: Chop carrots, cabbage, bell peppers, and spring onions into thin strips. Keep them ready.

steps.title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
steps.description: Heat oil in a wok. Add garlic, vegetables, and stir-fry on high heat for 2-3 minutes until slightly tender.

steps.title: Add Sauces
steps.description: Add soy sauce, vinegar, chili sauce, and a pinch of pepper. Toss everything together quickly.

steps.title: Mix Noodles
steps.description: Add boiled noodles to the wok. Toss everything on high heat for 2 minutes until well combined.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Garnish with chopped spring onions. Serve hot with chili sauce or manchurian on the side.

steps.title: Prepare Rice
steps.description: Use 2 cups of cooked and cooled rice (day-old rice works best). Break up any clumps with your fingers.

steps.title: Scramble Eggs
steps.description: Beat 2 eggs with salt. Heat oil in a wok, scramble eggs until just cooked. Remove and set aside.

steps.title: Stir-Fry Vegetables
steps.description: In the same wok, add more oil, garlic, peas, carrots, beans. Stir-fry on high heat for 2 minutes.

steps.title: Add Rice
steps.description: Add the cooked rice. Toss and stir-fry for 3-4 minutes breaking up any clumps. Keep the heat high.

steps.title: Season
steps.description: Add soy sauce, vinegar, pepper, and scrambled eggs. Toss everything together for 1-2 minutes.

steps.title: Garnish
steps.description: Garnish with chopped spring onions. Serve hot with chili sauce or manchurian gravy.

steps.title: Marinate Paneer
steps.description: Mix yogurt, ginger-garlic paste, red chili powder, garam masala, kasuri methi, and salt. Add 250g paneer cubes and bell peppers. Marinate for 15 minutes.

steps.title: Prepare Skewers
steps.description: Thread marinated paneer cubes, bell peppers, and onions alternately on skewers. Brush with oil.

steps.title: Grill First Side
steps.description: Place skewers on a hot grill or tawa. Cook on medium-high heat for 3-4 minutes until lightly charred.

steps.title: Flip and Cook
steps.description: Flip the skewers carefully. Brush with butter and cook for another 3-4 minutes until all sides are golden.

steps.title: Apply Butter
steps.description: Remove from heat. Brush generously with melted butter and sprinkle chaat masala on top.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Serve hot with mint chutney, onion rings, and lemon wedges. Perfect as an appetizer!

steps.title: Marinate Chicken
steps.description: Mix yogurt, lemon juice, garlic paste, paprika, cumin, coriander powder, and salt. Marinate 400g sliced chicken for 20 minutes.

steps.title: Cook Chicken
steps.description: Heat oil in a pan. Add marinated chicken and cook on high heat until golden brown and fully cooked.

steps.title: Prepare Sauce
steps.description: Mix mayonnaise, yogurt, minced garlic, lemon juice, and salt to make shawarma sauce. Keep aside.

steps.title: Warm Wraps
steps.description: Heat pita bread or flatbreads on a tawa for 30 seconds each side until soft and pliable.

steps.title: Assemble Roll
steps.description: Spread sauce on wrap, add cooked chicken, lettuce, tomatoes, onions, pickles. Roll tightly and wrap in foil.

steps.title: Grill & Serve
steps.description: Grill the wrapped roll on tawa for 2 minutes each side. Cut in half and serve hot with fries.

steps.title: Prepare Vegetables
steps.description: Finely chop cabbage, carrots, beans, and capsicum. Squeeze out excess water from vegetables.

steps.title: Make Batter
steps.description: Mix chopped vegetables with cornflour, all-purpose flour, ginger-garlic paste, soy sauce, salt, and pepper to form a thick mixture.

steps.title: Fry Balls
steps.description: Shape mixture into small balls. Deep fry in hot oil until golden brown and crispy. Drain on paper towels.

steps.title: Prepare Sauce
steps.description: Heat oil, add garlic, ginger, green chilies. Add soy sauce, chili sauce, vinegar, tomato ketchup, and water. Bring to boil.

steps.title: Thicken Gravy
steps.description: Add cornflour mixed with water. Stir continuously until gravy thickens to desired consistency.

steps.title: Toss & Serve
steps.description: Add fried manchurian balls to gravy. Toss gently. Garnish with spring onions and serve hot with fried rice.

steps.title: Boil Pasta
steps.description: Boil 250g penne pasta in salted water until al dente (8-10 minutes). Drain and save 1 cup pasta water.

steps.title: Sauté Vegetables
steps.description: Heat olive oil and butter. Sauté minced garlic, sliced mushrooms, bell peppers, and Italian herbs for 3-4 minutes.

steps.title: Make Sauce
steps.description: Add heavy cream, milk, and grated parmesan cheese. Stir until cheese melts and sauce is smooth.

steps.title: Add Pasta
steps.description: Add boiled pasta to the sauce. Toss well. Add pasta water if needed to adjust consistency.

steps.title: Season
steps.description: Season with salt, black pepper, oregano, and chili flakes. Toss everything together on low heat.

steps.title: Serve
steps.description: Garnish with fresh basil and grated parmesan. Serve hot with garlic bread on the side.

steps.title: Soak Rice
steps.description: Wash and soak 2 cups basmati rice in water for 30 minutes. This helps achieve long, fluffy grains.

steps.title: Prepare Vegetables
steps.description: Chop potatoes, carrots, beans, cauliflower, and green peas. Soak in water to prevent browning.

steps.title: Cook Vegetables
steps.description: Heat oil, fry onions until golden. Add vegetables, ginger-garlic paste, yogurt, and spices. Cook for 8 minutes.

steps.title: Parboil Rice
steps.description: Boil water with whole spices (bay leaf, cinnamon, cardamom). Add soaked rice and cook until 70% done. Drain.

steps.title: Layer Biryani
steps.description: Layer vegetables and rice alternately. Top with fried onions, mint, coriander, and saffron milk.

steps.title: Dum Cooking
steps.description: Cover pot tightly with foil and lid. Cook on low heat for 20 minutes. Let it rest for 5 minutes before serving.
